thread.title: Kick Up Your Style Game With These Quirky Socks
thread.title_full: Kick Up Your Style Game With These Quirky Socks

title: Kick Up Your Style Game With These Quirky Socks
text:
Kick Up Your Style Game With These Quirky Socks When 'Socksy' Becomes Sexy Aindrila Mitra   
As a woman, I can tell you that checking out a man bottom-up (and I’m not talking about the ass here!), is something we like doing. After all shoes maketh a man (something I firmly believe in) and if you dress up your shoes with the right pair of socks, you’ve got your sartorial game on-point. 
Men who wear quirky, crazy, and colourful socks are usually independent, interesting and successful, at least according to this research . And why not, not every regular Joe can pull off that beer socks with swag. Those who dare to wear some crazy and cool socks are usually non-conformists and confident in their own skin. And something most women, I can tell you from experience, fancy. 
Even though it’s probably the tiniest and least expensive fashion item when it comes to dressing up your ensemble, a pair of socks actually directly reflects your eye to detail, and more importantly your personality. You know that beer sock can up your cool quotient by a few notches, or that abstract socksy is sexier than you’d imagine. ‘Cause it helps you complete your look to the T. 
So to make your jet-setting life and decision easier, we’ve put together a list of 10 quirky socks that’re sure to cheer you up and complete your look, in style. Take your pick (based on your quirk level). 1. Weed Socks
